tool.name: SAGA.ta_morphometry.26
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEM False output_data_C_LOCAL $output_data_C_LOCAL output_data_C_UP $output_data_C_UP output_data_C_UP_LOCAL $output_data_C_UP_LOCAL output_data_C_DOWN $output_data_C_DOWN output_data_C_DOWN_LOCAL $output_data_C_DOWN_LOCAL name SAGA.ta_morphometry.26 DEM $DEM WEIGHTING $WEIGHTING prefer $prefer response $response outputType_C_LOCAL $OutputSection_C_LOCAL.outputType_C_LOCAL transmissionMode_C_LOCAL $OutputSection_C_LOCAL.transmissionMode_C_LOCAL outputType_C_UP $OutputSection_C_UP.outputType_C_UP transmissionMode_C_UP $OutputSection_C_UP.transmissionMode_C_UP outputType_C_UP_LOCAL $OutputSection_C_UP_LOCAL.outputType_C_UP_LOCAL transmissionMode_C_UP_LOCAL $OutputSection_C_UP_LOCAL.transmissionMode_C_UP_LOCAL outputType_C_DOWN $OutputSection_C_DOWN.outputType_C_DOWN transmissionMode_C_DOWN $OutputSection_C_DOWN.transmissionMode_C_DOWN outputType_C_DOWN_LOCAL $OutputSection_C_DOWN_LOCAL.outputType_C_DOWN_LOCAL transmissionMode_C_DOWN_LOCAL $OutputSection_C_DOWN_LOCAL.transmissionMode_C_DOWN_LOCAL

param.name: DEM
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_C_LOCAL
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_C_LOCAL
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

param.name: outputType_C_UP

section.name: OutputSection_C_DOWN_LOCAL
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_C_DOWN_LOCAL
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This tool first calculates the local curvature of a cell as sum of the gradients (i.e. tangens of slope) to its neighbour cells. This is a simple estimation of the general curvature and is strongly correlated with general curvatures calculated with other methods (e.g. Zevenbergen & Thorne 1987). Then upslope curvature is calculated as the distance and flow proportional weighted average local curvature over a cell's upslope contributing area following the multiple flow direction algorithm after Freeman (1991). In a similar way the downslope curvature is calculated by summarizing the curvatures of all hydrologically downslope connected cells. The local upslope/downslope curvatures just take the immediately neighboured cells into account.
